title: PHPlibxml_get_errors()Function

metadata.description: Learn about PHPlibxml_get_errors()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example
Get the errors from the libxml error buffer:
<?php
libxml_get_errors()
?>
Definition and Usage
The libxml_get_errors() function gets the errors from the the libxml error buffer.
Syntax
libxml_get_errors()
Technical Details
Return Value:
Returns an array of error objects, or an empty array if there are no errors 
in the error buffer
PHP Version:
5.1+

★
+1
